# What is GenoPred?

GenoPred is a research programme based at Kingâ€™s College London that focuses on key issues relating to the clinical utility of polygenic scores, investigating key polygenic scoring research questions, and developing tools that implement current best practises.

# GenoPred Research

[GenoPred research](research_index.html) themes include comparison of existing polygenic scoring methods, evaluation of novel polygenic scoring approaches, and provision of interpretable polygenic predictions.

# GenoPred Tools

[GenoPred tools](tools_index.html) enable robust calculation and interpretation of polygenic scores, facilitating further investigation and application.
